name: select_race_based_on_race_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool f1_race_schedule.
Tool description: This API provides the user with up-to-date dates and timings for all the races in the ongoing F1 season.
API description: Returns the details for the race based on the race number for the track in the F1 season.

race_no.description: The race number of the Formula 1 race to get details for.
